channel.title: Insights on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Insights on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Why Social Gaming is on the decline? Blame cannibalisation by mobile and OTT
item.description: Social Gaming is on the decline - not terminal decline, just platform cannibalisation.

item.title: Digital Project Management Quality, Quantity Time [humour]
item.description: In all honesty - project management planning should include this as a standard assessment tool -

item.title: Rackspace - you wish for simplicity - what you get is simply choice
item.description: Everyone I talk to in digital marketing and everyone who wants to be a technical expert has an opinion on Rackspace.

item.title: Comments are Free
item.description: With any successful blog, Comments and Spam are juxtaposed at opposite ends of the spectrum.

item.title: Every Important Stat can be drawn in a 2×2 Grid
item.description: Nolan Chart - XKCD Just to prove a point - the 2×2 grid is the best way to show-off pretty much interesting statistic or insight

item.title: Gartner predicts App Store Revenue Forecast to Surpass $15 Billion in 2011
item.description: I’ve been on the lookout for this prediction - in 2010 Gartner predicted Worldwide Mobile App Revenues of xx Billion - for 2011 the prediction is for this to exceed $15 billion

item.title: Apple Mac App Store initially I was dubious
item.description: Initially I was dubious or even skeptical about the new Apple Mac App Store - and everyone from Mashable to ReadWriteWeb to Download Squad have already done a post about first thoughts or white washed the Apple PR news item.
